sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="09ff3d105f231000b12e3572f2b4775d" table="x_415531_rapid_ato_ars_3_1"> <x_415531_rapid_ato_ars_3_1 action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>true</active> <activity_due/> <additional_assignee_list/> <approval>not requested</approval> <approval_history/> <approval_set/> <ars_id display_value="ARS 3.1">43903e93dbcd1010280df36f299619aa</ars_id> <assessment_methods_and_objects>Systems processing, storing, or transm</assessment_methods_and_objects> <assessment_objective>Systems processing, storing, or transmitting PII (to include PHI):  Determine if information regarding privacy policies are publicly available.</assessment_objective> <assigned_to/> <assignment_group/> <assurance/> <baseline>High; Moderate; Low</baseline> <business_duration/> <business_service/> <calendar_duration/> <close_notes/> <closed_at/> <closed_by/> <cmdb_ci/> <comments/> <comments_and_work_notes/> <company/> <contact_type/> <contract/> <control_definition>Systems processing, storing, or transmitting PII (to include PHI):  The organization: a. Ensures that the public has access to information about its privacy activities and can communicate with its Senior Official for Privacy (SOP); andb. Ensures that its privacy practices are publicly available through organizational websites or otherwise.</control_definition> <control_family display_value="Transparency">db87bdfcdb211010280df36f29961960</control_family> <control_name>Dissemination of Privacy Program Information</control_name> <control_number>TR-03</control_number> <control_type>Mandatory</control_type> <correlation_display/> <correlation_id/> <delivery_plan/> <delivery_task/> <description/> <due_date/> <escalation>0</escalation> <expected_start/> <follow_up/> <group_id>TR-03</group_id> <group_list/> <high>true</high> <impact>3</impact> <implementation_standards/> <knowledge>false</knowledge> <location/> <low>true</low> <made_sla>true</made_sla> <moderate>true</moderate> <number>ARSC0011281</number> <opened_at>2020-06-19 13:21:33</opened_at> <opened_by display_value="System Administrator">6816f79cc0a8016401c5a33be04be441</opened_by> <order/> <parent/> <priority>3</priority> <reassignment_count>0</reassignment_count> <reference_policy>Code: 5 U.S.C. §552a(e)(4); Pub. L. No. 107-347, §208(b)(1)(B)(iii); E-Gov: §208; OMB Memo: M-03-22, M-10-23 Section 4 Privacy Act: §552a</reference_policy> <rejection_goto/> <related_controls>AR-6</related_controls> <service_offering/> <short_description/> <sla_due/> <standard>NIST-800</standard> <state>1</state> <supplemental_guidance>Guidance for systems processing, storing, or transmitting PII (to include PHI):  Making information about an organization’s privacy program readily available to the public reduces the burden on individuals wanting to better understand an organization’s privacy practices; and reduces burden on privacy offices and program officials by providing answers to common privacy questions through an easily accessible forum.Organizations employ different mechanisms for informing the public about their privacy practices including, but not limited to, privacy impact assessments (PIA), system of records notices (SORN), privacy reports, publicly available web pages, email distributions, blogs, and periodic publications (e.g., quarterly newsletters). Organizations also employ publicly facing email addresses and/or phone lines that enable the public to provide feedback and/or direct questions to privacy offices regarding privacy practices.</supplemental_guidance> <sys_class_name>x_415531_rapid_ato_ars_3_1</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-06-19 13:21:33</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>09ff3d105f231000b12e3572f2b4775d</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path>!!!/!!!/</sys_domain_path> <sys_id>df87bdfcdb211010280df36f29961980</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-06-19 13:21:33</sys_updated_on> <task_for/> <time_worked/> <upon_approval>proceed</upon_approval> <upon_reject>cancel</upon_reject> <urgency>3</urgency> <user_input/> <variables/> <watch_list/> <wf_activity/> <work_end/> <work_notes/> <work_notes_list/> <work_start/> </x_415531_rapid_ato_ars_3_1> </record_update>
